GB: Generate V-Blank interrupt for all hardware types

Fix V-Blank interrupt generation to work for all Game Boy hardware
types (GB, GBC, SGB, GBA) instead of only specific combinations.

The original code had split logic:
- gbHardware & 0x5 (GB/SGB only) for first V-Blank path
- gbHardware & 0xa (GBC/GBA only) for second V-Blank path  

This caused GB games to miss V-Blank interrupts entirely, preventing
some games like RoboCop (Rev.01) from progressing past the title screen.

Changes:
- Remove hardware restrictions on V-Blank interrupt generation
- Add missing gbInterruptLaunched flag setting in first code path
- Add gbInterruptWait mechanism for GBC/GBA to prevent premature clearing
